doc.field: This layer represents locations of all publicly available parking facilities with preferential terms for registered carpools and vanpools.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><eainfo><overview><eaover>Each point contains the following information about the parking facility:
Type: Type of lot (public lot, public ramp, private lot, private ramp, on-street,facility)
Name: Name of parking area
Location: Description of location
MonthlyCos: Monthly cost to permit holders
Notes: Additional information
Phone: Organization's phone number
Email: Organization's e-mail contact
Website: Organization's website address
This information was collected from organizations that negotiate pool parking contracts and issue pool parking permits: Metro Transit, St. Paul Smart Trips, Minneapolis Commuter Connection.</eaover></overview></eainfo><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>Metropolitan Council</origin><title>Pool Parking Locations</title><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council - Metro Transit</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>20120320</pubdate><onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/PoolParkingLocations.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This layer represents locations of all publicly available parking facilities with preferential terms for registered carpools and vanpools.</abstract><purpose>To provide location and contact information for preferential pool parking in the Twin Cities.</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington.</supplinf></descript><timeperd><current>Current</current><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20120320</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As Needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Minneapolis, St. Paul</placekey></place><theme><themekey>Parking, Carpool, Vanpool, Commuting</themekey></theme></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council - Metro Transit</cntorg><cntper>Tony Drollinger</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>TDM Program, Metro Transit - Rideshare</cntpos><cntaddr><address>560 6th Ave N</address><city>Minneapolis</city><state>MN</state><postal>55411</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>612.349.7533</cntvoice><cntemail>tony.drollinger@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><complete>Entire 7 county area is covered.</complete><attracc><attraccr>Unknown</attraccr></attracc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>The points were located by comparing maps of facilities provided by St. Paul Smart Trips and the Minneapolis Commuter Connection to aerial imagery in ArcGIS</procdesc></procstep></lineage></dataqual><metainfo><metd>20120320</metd><metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn><metstdv>1.2</metstdv><metextns><onlink>http://www.mngeo.state.mn.us/committee/standards/mgmg/metadata.htm</onlink></metextns><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council - - ArcView shape files - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.
Additionally, this dataset is available for direct use via one or more map services. More information about what a map service is can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/services/.
